Xiaomi Redmi Note 11 Pro Plus 5G PRICE IN INDIA

Xiaomi Redmi Note 11 Pro Plus 5G price in India starts from Rs. 20,949. The lowest price of Xiaomi Redmi Note 11 Pro Plus 5G is Rs. 20,949 at flipkart.com. This is 6 GB RAM / 128 GB internal storage base variant of Xiaomi Redmi Note 11 Pro Plus 5G which is available in Phantom White, Mirage Blue, Stealth Black colour.

Xiaomi Redmi Note 11 Pro Plus 5G Review

Read Full Review
3.5/5

Redmi Note 11 Pro+ review: One Step Forward, Two Steps Back

Is the Redmi Note 11 Pro+ THE affordable phone to get? Read our review to find out!

Mar 22 2022 By Prateek Pandey
PROS
  • Stylish design
  • Capable performer
  • Stunning display
  • Long-lasting battery backup
CONS
  • Main camera needs optimisation
  • Cannot stream HDR content
  • Cannot record 4K videos
Verdict

The Redmi Note 11 Pro+ is a decent mid-ranger, although, the device falls slightly short of expectations. Be that as it may, the handset offers a serviceable Android experience, provided you can look past its shortcomings.
